## Block.getField() method

Returns the named field from a block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getField(name: string): Field | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the field. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Field](./blockly.field.md) \| null
